feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued November 23 at 3:54AM AKST until November 24 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ward Lake in the Southern Inner Channels. * WHEN...Until 300 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas near Ward Lake.

entry.summary: ...Patchy Dense Fog Across Okeechobee County and the Treasure Coast Continuing This Morning... entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 22 at 7:42PM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Sanford affecting Seminole County. .The Saint Johns River at Sanford is forecast to slowly fall while remaining within Minor Flood Stage this week and through this weekend. Residents and interests along the river should expect a continuation of Minor flood impacts.
